summary: IN DECEMBER 2016 I RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE REGARDING THE FRONT PASSENGER AIR BAG. THE RECALL NOTICE IS AN "INTERIM"  NOTICE.THE NOTICE INDICATES THAT A REMEDY IS NOT YET AVAILABLE.  IT IT IS NOW JULY 2017 AND I HAVE NOT HEARD A WORD FROM TOYOTA IN REGARDS TO HOW THEY ARE GOING TO REMEDY THE SITUATION. I AM PAYING FOR A VEHICLE THAT I CAN NOT FULLY UTILIZE.
